Docs.summary: Provides several important [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] base element classes, various classes that support the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system and event logic, and other types that are more broadly consumed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core and framework.
